meanings.sent1: The sailors used handspikes to turn the capstan and raise the anchor.
meanings.sent2: He grabbed the handspikes to help rotate the capstan smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The handspikes decided to have a race to see who could turn the capstan the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like handspikes, steadily turning the wheel of progress.
